product_name: adidas Terrex Swift Mountain Summer Jacket - Men's
long_description: The men's adidas Terrex Swift Mountain Summer Soft-Shell Jacket offers excellent stretch and breathable comfort for climbs and hikes on mild days, but it also resists unexpected rain and wind. Double-weave nylon is tough and stretchy, so you can move freely. Hood and cuffs adjust for protection and comfort. The adidas Terrex Swift Mountain Summer Jacket for men offers zippered hand pockets and a single zip chest pocket.
short_description: The men's adidas Terrex Swift Mountain Summer Soft-Shell Jacket offers excellent stretch and breathable comfort for climbs and hikes on mild days, but it also resists unexpected rain and wind.
